p: The goldenrod extract, as well as the one combined with ciprofloxacin at 1 Ã— MIC, showed a short-term post-antibiotic effect (PAE), which lasted only 45 min ( Figure 4, Table 2). A slightly longer duration of PAE (1 h) was observed in the presence of the extract and amikacin ( Figure 5, Table 2). E. coli bacteria incubated only in the presence of ciprofloxacin increased their growth by one logarithmic value after 2 h. Amikacin showed the longest duration of PAE, lasting 3 h 30 min ( Table 2).
